Title: Requires the notification of individuals that certain work-study, internship, externship or other work placements meet the work requirements of title nine-B of the social services law
Summary: Requires the notification of individuals that certain work-study, internship, externship or other work placements offered by institutions of higher education meet the work requirements of title nine-B of article five of the social services law.
LawCode: Add Art 14 Part 4 ยง685, Ed L; add ยง337-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the social services law, in relation to notifying individuals that certain work-study, internship, externship or other work placements offered by institutions of higher education meet the work requirements of title nine-B of article five of the social services law
